original_text: This top part is 2 metres high. They burn the sacrifices on this top part. Its four corners have points like horns that go up.
korean_text: 그 번제단 위층의 높이는 네 척이며 그 번제하는 바닥에서 솟은 뿔이 넷이며

sentences.original_text: This top part is 2 metres high.
They burn the sacrifices on this top part.
Its four corners have points like horns
sentences.korean_translation: 그 네 귀퉁이에는 뿔처럼 생긴 뾰족한 부분이 있습니다.
